message: Let's start fair. I get the bigger share, but I'm willing to negotiate.
You got 2/3 in the first round, I'm offering you a smaller share this time. It's your turn to make a better offer or accept this one.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. This is a fair offer.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not going to give up. You're getting a smaller share than in your last offer, and I'm still willing to negotiate.
